title: HoP 335 - Sabrina Ebbersmeyer on Emotions in Renaissance Philosophy
itunes:title: HoP 335 - Sabrina Ebbersmeyer on Emotions in Renaissance Philosophy
description: An interview with Sabrina Ebbersmeyer about the relation of emotion to reason and the body, and panpsychism, in the Renaissance.
